0..desc: Hey there, this is example script of simple_RPG... And remember that everything shown here is fantasy, any resemblance is purely coincidental

0.1..desc: So, in this role playing, you can create a web application or mobile application, which one will you like to build?

0.1.1..desc: Priyang : Nice choice, web applications are in trent today. Oh, btw I am Priyang, I'll help you with your web project. What would you like to build?

I want to build a portfolio website

It would be great to have an educational website

I always wanted to create an ecommerce website

0.1.2..desc: Madhav : Hey, I am Madhav. I will help you build the mobile application of your dreams. What would you like to create?

I want my own social media apllication

I want to create a game

0.1.1.1..desc: Utkarsh : Alright so as they are working on the frontend of the application, I can create the backend for you. Would you like to add anything else?

No, I just want a simple app

Yes, it would be great to implement the artificial intelligence in it as well

I want the utmost security in that

0.1.1.1.1..winning_message: As they say 'Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication', your simple application got so popular, congratulations

0.1.1.1.2..desc: Mann : I am Artificial Intelligence expert Mann. Which model would you like to use in your application?

I want to use reinforcement learning

I want to use deep learning

0.1.1.1.2.2..losing_message: Lol, Your application got hacked by someone

0.1.1.1.3..desc: Aalap : Hello, I am cyber security expert here. It is very thoughtful of you to think about security of your application. I will make it foolproof now

0.1.1.1.3.1..winning_message: You have created a perfect application, congratulations
